channel.title: Killcounter
channel.description:
hi btw sorry that i repost i was on school when i posted the other one and i did not had the time to exactly explain what i need in the killcounter sorry can anyone pls make me a sort of killcounter its for the following idea i want it that it count the number of npc's i killed and when i have ,lets say 10000 kills i must have a way to open a command like this
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godsword")) { if (i dont know what to type here but lets say : playerkills == 10000 { addItem(godswordid,1) } else { sendMessage("sorry you have not enough kills for this command") }
and the killcounter must be in the upper left side of the screen can somebody pls make one for me or send me a tutorial i am looking for it for a long time now and i can't find it btw sorry for my bad english :) thanks in advance kevin[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2008, 08:03:08 AM[/size][hr]just a script about how to make the killcounter is good too how i need to put it in a command i find out myself

item.title: Killcounter
item.dc:creator: @kevin-net2 kevin-net2
item.description:
@kevin-net2 wrote:

hi

btw sorry that i repost
i was on school when i posted the other one and i did not had the time to exactly explain what i need in the killcounter
sorry

can anyone pls make me a sort of killcounter
its for the following idea
i want it that it count the number of npc’s i killed
and when i have ,lets say 10000 kills i must have a way
to open a command like this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godsword")) { if (i dont know what to type here but lets say : playerkills == 10000 { addItem(godswordid,1) } else { sendMessage("sorry you have not enough kills for this command") }
and the killcounter must be in the upper left side of the screen

can somebody pls make one for me or send me a tutorial
i am looking for it for a long time now and i can’t find it

btw sorry for my bad english

thanks in advance
